full_summary:
================================================================
**Request for Proposal (RFP) W6893-22A010-2**
----------------------------------------------------------

**Project Title:**
Acquisition, delivery, and installation of Furniture CAT 1, 2, 5, and 6 under the Shared Action Plan E60PQ-140003 at the Department of National Defence (DND), Saint-Jean.

**Tender Details:**

* **Reference Number:** WS3606409128- Doc3711940336
* **Amendment Number:** 7
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3606409128
* **Publication Date:** October 17, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 17, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

**Important Notice:**
Please note that the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and Buyandsell posting closing time are disregarded. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted at the latest by 2:00 PM EST on November 17, 2022.

**RFP Description:**
PWGSC, on behalf of DND, is issuing this RFP for the acquisition of Furniture CAT 1, 2, 5, and 6, including delivery and installation, located in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada. The tender specifications are detailed in Section 3.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is open to contractors who have a valid Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), or North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) standing offer.

**Region of Opportunity:**
None

**Region of Delivery:**
The furniture will be delivered and installed in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada.

**Contact Information:**
Julien, Lisa-Marie (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

I made sure the original information content is preserved, even though some original fields can be safely excluded (ensure this).
